attributes.action: Pardon Guy Fawkes. The only man to enter parliament with honest intentions.
attributes.background: He didn't plan to enter to make himself wealthy, to fiddle expenses, to use his position to make himself powerful. Unlike pretty much everyone since. He should be a national hero.

rejection.details:
A pardon of this kind would be granted by the Monarch.

You could start a petition to ask the Government to request such a pardon in this case.
